bug.author: fanyun-sun
bug.summary: FasterRCNN: DetectionResult not defined in train.py
bug.description:
I'm running ./train.py with the flag --visualize. There are two errors:
DetectionResult undefined in train.py (probably should import it from eval? KeyError: "The name 'generate_rpn_proposals/probs:0' refers to a Tensor which does not exist. The operation, 'generate_rpn_proposals/probs', do es not exist in the graph."
